name: Sampson Bros., Inc., Appellant, v. Monroeville Water Authority
name_abbreviation: Sampson Bros. v. Monroeville Water Authority

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Sampson Bros., Inc., Appellant, v. Monroeville Water Authority.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: C. Francis Fisher, with him Karl E. Weise, and Kirsch, Truwall & Weise, and Brenlove & Fisher, for appellants.
■ Dominic B. King, with him Aaron Cohen, and Cohen é Popiel, for appellees.

Sampson Bros., Inc., Appellant, v. Monroeville Water Authority.
Argued October 12, 1964.
December 3, 1964:
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
